data.title: Phillips Brooks School • Preschool through 5th Grade • Menlo Park, Calif.
data.meta_description: Phillips Brooks School is an independent, co-educational day school offering a truly child-centered learning program for preschool through 5th grade.
data.text:
10 Things…

…We Know and Love About PBS

By passionately pursuing core teaching beliefs in ways that set us apart, we create the extraordinary every day at Phillips Brooks School. We guide children to cultivate their individual talents, explore, and dig deep, while working together. In the process, they discover their best selves and truly flourish. We invite you to take a closer look at what we know and love about inspiring young learners.

Inside this edition, you’ll find a warm welcome to our incoming Interim Head of School, Diane Rosenberg. We’ll share all the exciting happenings on campus, including Alum events, the success of our Spring Benefit for Financial Aid, and Graduation.

Read more » about Brooks • PBS Alum Newsletter - Summer 2024 (opens in new window/tab)

Read more » about Graduation 2024 • June 5, 2024

On Friday, May 24, Dr. Scott Erickson, PBS Head of School, delivered our final talk of the year on the topic of "The GATHER talk on all GATHER talks," to culminate the 2023-2024 series.

Read more » about "The GATHER Talk on GATHER Talks" by Scott Erickson
